welcome.title: One account across Telegram and Web
welcome.subtitle: Use one user profile, switch providers, and keep all your sessions in one place.
welcome.inTelegram: You are inside Telegram. Session bootstrap runs automatically.
welcome.bootstrapError: Telegram authorization failed. Please try reopening the mini app.

features.title: What you get
features.identity: Unified identity with explicit provider linking
features.security: Email verification flow for account linking
features.ux: Friendly interface for both browser and Telegram
features.authProviders: Three sign-in providers: Telegram, Email, Google
features.notes: Text notes with add and delete actions
features.i18n: Built-in localization for English and Russian
features.platforms: Single experience for Telegram miniapp and standalone web

dashboard.linkingMovedTitle: Linking is now part of Profile

notes.listSubtitle: Notes are stored in Postgres and available in web and mini app.
